response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds significant value to me, but recognizing its potential worth to you, I am prepared to consider offers. Given its immense value to you, I propose a price of $950,000 for the product. I believe this figure strikes a fair balance between respecting its true worth and ensuring a reasonable return for me. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your expectations, and we can proceed accordingly.", "product_price": 950000}
